dcterms:description: The CVC-ClinicDB dataset consists of 612 images extracted from 29 different video studies, annotated by expert video endoscopists, used for evaluating polyp segmentation models.
dcterms:title: CVC-ClinicDB

dcterms:creator: J. Silva
A. Histace
O. Romain
X. Dray
B. Granado
dcterms:description: The ETIS-Larib dataset contains a total of 196 high-resolution images, annotated for the purpose of embedded detection of polyps in wireless capsule endoscopy images.
dcterms:title: ETIS-Larib

dcterms:creator: J. Bernal
J. Sánchez
F. Vilarino
dcterms:description: The CVC-ColonDB dataset contains 15 different polyps in 380 images, used for automatic polyp detection and segmentation.
dcterms:title: CVC-ColonDB

dcterms:creator: D. Jha
P. H. Smedsrud
M. A. Riegler
P. Halvorsen
T. de Lange
D. Johansen
H. D. Johansen
dcterms:description: The Kvasir-SEG dataset includes 1000 polyp images with varying sizes, aimed at providing a comprehensive resource for polyp segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Kvasir-SEG
